n = int(input())
s = input()
t = input()
if s.count('1') != t.count('1'):
    print(-1)
    return

p = []
ans = [0, 0]
for i in range(n):
    if s[i] != t[i]:
        if p and s[i] != p[-1]:
            p.pop(-1)
        else:
            p.append(s[i])
            w = int(s[i])
            ans[w] = max(ans[w], len(p))
print(sum(ans))

input()
s0=input()
s1=input()
if s0.count('1')!=s1.count('1'):
	print(-1)
else:
	m0=0
	m1=0
	v0=0
	v1=0
	for i,j in zip(s0,s1):
		if i!=j:
			v0+= 1 if i=='1' else -1
			v1+= 1 if j=='1' else -1
			m0=max(v0,m0)
			m1=max(v1,m1)
	print(m0+m1)
